lustre/tests/sendfile.c

00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <unistd.h>
00037 #include <fcntl.h>
00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 #include <errno.h>
00040 #include <time.h>
00041 #include <sys/types.h>
00042 #include <sys/socket.h>
00043 #include <sys/sendfile.h>
00044 #include <sys/stat.h>
00045 #include <sys/socket.h>
00046 
00047 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00048 
00049 #define syserr(str) { perror(str); exit(-1); }
00050 
00051 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00052 {
00053         char *sfile, *tfile;
00054         struct stat stbuf;
00055         int size;
00056         unsigned long bufsize = 1024 * 1024;
00057         int infd, outfd;
00058         int sd[2];
00059         int rc;
00060         char *buf;
00061         char cmd[1024];
00062         loff_t pos;
00063 
00064         if (argc < 3) {
00065                 fprintf(stderr, "%s <source file> <dest file>\n", argv[0]);
00066                 exit(-1);
00067         }
00068 
00069         sfile = argv[1];
00070         tfile = argv[2];
00071 
00072         if (stat(sfile, &stbuf) < 0) {
00073                 if (errno == ENOENT) {
00074                         /* assume doing non-object file testing */
00075                         infd = open(sfile, O_LOV_DELAY_CREATE|O_CREAT|O_RDWR,
00076                                     0644);
00077                         if (infd < 0)
00078                                 syserr("open source file:");
00079 
00080                         size = random() % (1 * 1024 * 1024) + 1024;
00081                         if (ftruncate(infd, (off_t)size) < 0)
00082                                 syserr("truncate file error:");
00083                 } else {
00084                         syserr("stat file: ");
00085                 }
00086         } else if (S_ISREG(stbuf.st_mode)) {
00087                 size = (int)stbuf.st_size;
00088                 infd = open(sfile, O_RDONLY, 0644);
00089                 if (infd < 0)
00090                         syserr("Open an existing file error:");
00091         } else {
00092                 fprintf(stderr, "%s is not a regular file\n", sfile);
00093                 exit(-1);
00094         }
00095 
00096         outfd = open(tfile, O_WRONLY|O_TRUNC|O_CREAT, 0666);
00097         if (outfd < 0)
00098                 syserr("open dest file:");
00099 
00100         rc = socketpair(AF_LOCAL, SOCK_STREAM, 0, sd);
00101         if (rc < 0)
00102                 syserr("socketpair");
00103 
00104         rc = fcntl(sd[0], F_SETFL, O_NONBLOCK);
00105         if (rc < 0)
00106                 syserr("fcntl");
00107 
00108         rc = setsockopt(sd[0], SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF,
00109                         &bufsize, sizeof(bufsize));
00110         if (rc)
00111                 syserr("setsockopt");
00112 
00113         srandom(time(NULL));
00114 
00115         pos = 0;
00116         while (size > 0) {
00117                 int rc2;
00118                 size_t seg_size;
00119 
00120                 seg_size = random() % bufsize + 1;
00121                 if (seg_size > size)
00122                         seg_size = size;
00123 
00124                 while (seg_size) {
00125                         rc = sendfile(sd[0], infd, &pos, seg_size);
00126                         if (rc < 0)
00127                                 syserr("sendfile:");
00128 
00129                         seg_size -= rc;
00130                         size -= rc;
00131                         if (size == 0)
00132                                 close(sd[0]);
00133 
00134                         buf = malloc(rc);
00135                         if (read(sd[1], buf, rc) < 0)
00136                                 syserr("read from socket:");
00137 
00138                         rc2 = write(outfd, buf, rc);
00139                         if (rc2 != rc)
00140                                 syserr("write dest file error:");
00141                         free(buf);
00142                 }
00143         }
00144         close(sd[1]), close(infd), close(outfd);
00145 
00146         snprintf(cmd, sizeof(cmd), "cmp %s %s\n", sfile, tfile);
00147         return system(cmd);
00148 }
